mapper.sql: (SELECT tb1.depotName platform,tb1.depotId,tb2.catName,tb2.id catId,tb1.gameCode codeid,tb1.gameName codename FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT id,depotId,depotName,catId,gameCode,gameName,subCatId FROM t_gm_game WHERE gameCode !='' UNION ALL SELECT id,depotId,depotName,catId,mbGameCode,gameName,subCatId FROM t_gm_game WHERE mbGameCode !='' UNION ALL SELECT id,depotId,depotName,catId,adGameCode,gameName,subCatId FROM t_gm_game WHERE adGameCode !='' UNION ALL SELECT id,depotId,depotName,catId,downGameCode,gameName,subCatId FROM t_gm_game WHERE downGameCode !='' UNION ALL SELECT id,depotId,depotName,catId,embeddedCode,gameName,subCatId FROM t_gm_game WHERE embeddedCode !='' UNION ALL SELECT id,depotId,depotName,catId,embeddedCode1,gameName,subCatId FROM t_gm_game WHERE embeddedCode1 !='') d GROUP BY d.depotId,d.catId,d.gameCode ORDER BY d.gameCode )tb1,t_gm_cat tb2 WHERE tb1.catId=tb2.id)
mapper.select:
SELECT #{isSign} level,count(tb1.username) total,sum(tb1.bet) betTotal,sum(tb1.validbet) validbetTotal, sum(tb1.payout) payoutTotal,CONCAT(tb1.platform,tb1.catName) categoryTotal,#{username} username FROM ( SELECT rbrd.username,rbrd.platform,tb.catName ,sum(rbrd.bet) bet,sum(rbrd.validbet) validbet,sum(rbrd.payout) payout FROM rpt_bet_rcd_day rbrd INNER JOIN mbr_account ma ON rbrd.username= ma.loginName INNER JOIN () tb ON rbrd.platform=tb.platform AND rbrd.gametype=tb.codeid
GROUP BY tb.platform,tb.catName,rbrd.username ) tb1 GROUP BY tb1.platform,tb1.catName

SELECT count(a.username) total,sum(a.bet) betTotal,sum(a.validbet) validbetTotal,sum(a.payout) payoutTotal FROM (SELECT rbrd.username,sum(rbrd.bet) bet,sum(rbrd.validbet) validbet,sum(rbrd.payout) payout,ma.cagencyId FROM rpt_bet_rcd_day rbrd INNER JOIN mbr_account ma ON rbrd.username= ma.loginName
GROUP BY rbrd.username) a

SELECT a.level,count(a.username) total,sum(a.bet) betTotal,sum(a.validbet) validbetTotal,sum(a.payout) payoutTotal, t.agyAccount username FROM ( SELECT e1.depth level,rbrd.username,sum(rbrd.bet) bet,sum(rbrd.validbet) validbet,sum(rbrd.payout) payout,a.childNodeId FROM rpt_bet_rcd_day rbrd INNER JOIN mbr_account ma ON rbrd.username= ma.loginName INNER JOIN (SELECT e.childNodeId FROM agy_tree e INNER JOIN agy_account t ON e.parentId = t.id WHERE t.agyAccount=#{agyAccount} and depth=1 ) a ON a.childNodeId = ma.cagencyId INNER JOIN agy_tree e1 ON e1.childNodeId = a.childNodeId INNER JOIN agy_account t ON e1.parentId = t.id AND t.parentId = 0
GROUP BY rbrd.username ) a LEFT JOIN agy_account t ON a.childNodeId = t.id GROUP BY a.childNodeId

SELECT rbrd.username username,sum(rbrd.bet) betTotal,sum(rbrd.validbet) validbetTotal,sum(rbrd.payout) payoutTotal FROM rpt_bet_rcd_day rbrd INNER JOIN mbr_account ma ON rbrd.username= ma.loginName
GROUP BY rbrd.username

SELECT 'account' level,count(tb1.username) total,sum(tb1.bet) betTotal,sum(tb1.validbet) validbetTotal, sum(tb1.payout) payoutTotal,CONCAT(tb1.platform,tb1.catName) categoryTotal,#{loginName} username FROM ( SELECT rbrd.username,rbrd.platform,tb.catName ,sum(rbrd.bet) bet,sum(rbrd.validbet) validbet, sum(rbrd.payout) payout,ma.parentId FROM rpt_bet_rcd_day rbrd INNER JOIN ( SELECT act.loginName,e.childNodeId,e.parentId FROM mbr_account ma INNER JOIN agy_account t ON t.id = ma.cagencyId INNER JOIN mbr_tree e ON e.parentId = ma.id INNER JOIN mbr_account act ON act.id = e.childNodeId WHERE ma.loginName = #{loginName} ) ma ON rbrd.username= ma.loginName INNER JOIN ( ) tb ON rbrd.platform=tb.platform AND rbrd.gametype=tb.codeid
GROUP BY tb.platform,tb.catName,rbrd.username) tb1 GROUP BY tb1.platform,tb1.catName
SELECT 1 total,rbrd.username,sum(rbrd.bet) betTotal,sum(rbrd.validbet) validbetTotal,sum(rbrd.payout) payoutTotal FROM rpt_bet_rcd_day rbrd INNER JOIN mbr_account ma ON rbrd.username= ma.loginName

SELECT 'account' level,count(tb1.username) total,sum(tb1.bet) betTotal, sum(tb1.validbet) validbetTotal,sum(tb1.payout) payoutTotal,t.loginName username FROM ( SELECT rbrd.username,a.parentId,sum(rbrd.bet) bet,sum(rbrd.validbet) validbet,sum(rbrd.payout) payout FROM rpt_bet_rcd_day rbrd INNER JOIN ( SELECT act.loginName,e.childNodeId,e.parentId FROM mbr_account ma INNER JOIN agy_account t ON t.id = ma.cagencyId INNER JOIN mbr_tree e ON e.parentId = ma.id INNER JOIN mbr_account act ON act.id = e.childNodeId WHERE t.agyAccount=#{agyAccount} GROUP BY e.childNodeId ) a ON a.loginName = rbrd.username
GROUP BY rbrd.username ) tb1 LEFT JOIN mbr_account t on t.id= tb1.parentId GROUP BY tb1.parentId

SELECT 'account' level,count(rbrd.username) total,sum(rbrd.bet) betTotal,sum(rbrd.validbet) validbetTotal, sum(rbrd.payout) payoutTotal,t.loginName username FROM ( SELECT rbrd.username,sum(rbrd.bet) bet,sum(rbrd.validbet) validbet,sum(rbrd.payout) payout,ma.parentId FROM rpt_bet_rcd_day rbrd INNER JOIN ( SELECT act.loginName,e1.childNodeId,e1.parentId FROM mbr_account ma INNER JOIN agy_account t ON t.id = ma.cagencyId INNER JOIN mbr_tree e ON e.parentId = ma.id and e.depth=1 INNER JOIN mbr_tree e1 ON e1.parentId = e.childNodeId INNER JOIN mbr_account act ON act.id = e1.childNodeId WHERE ma.loginName = #{loginName} ) ma ON rbrd.username= ma.loginName
GROUP BY rbrd.username ) rbrd LEFT JOIN mbr_account t ON t.id = rbrd.parentId GROUP BY rbrd.parentId

SELECT 'account' level,count(tb1.username) total,sum(tb1.bet) betTotal,sum(tb1.validbet) validbetTotal, sum(tb1.payout) payoutTotal,CONCAT(tb1.platform,tb1.catName) categoryTotal,#{loginName} username FROM ( SELECT rbrd.username,rbrd.platform,tb.catName ,sum(rbrd.bet) bet,sum(rbrd.validbet) validbet, sum(rbrd.payout) payout FROM rpt_bet_rcd_day rbrd INNER JOIN mbr_account ma ON rbrd.username= ma.loginName INNER JOIN ( ) tb ON rbrd.platform=tb.platform AND rbrd.gametype=tb.codeid
GROUP BY tb.platform,tb.catName,rbrd.username ) tb1 GROUP BY tb1.platform,tb1.catName

where.if: AND EXISTS( SELECT e.childNodeId FROM agy_tree e INNER JOIN agy_account t ON e.parentId = t.id WHERE t.agyAccount =#{agyAccount} AND ma.cagencyId = e.childNodeId )

mapper.select: SELECT e.depth FROM agy_tree e LEFT JOIN agy_account t ON e.parentId = t.id LEFT JOIN agy_account t1 ON t1.id = e.childNodeId WHERE t1.agyAccount = #{agyAccount} AND t.parentId = 0
SELECT count(*) FROM agy_tree e LEFT JOIN agy_account t ON e.parentId = t.id WHERE t.agyAccount = #{agyAccount} AND e.depth > 0
select agy.id,agy.agyAccount from agy_account agy join agy_tree at on agy.id=at.childNodeId where at.parentId= #{agyAccountId} and at.depth=1

select ma.loginName from mbr_account ma join agy_account agy on ma.cagencyId=agy.id where agy.id in (select DISTINCT agy.id from agy_account agy join agy_tree at on agy.id=at.childNodeId where at.parentId= #{agyAccountId} and at.depth=1 or agy.id=#{agyAccountId}) and ma.loginName=#{loginName}

SELECT #{agyAccount} username ,
'agent' level,
'mbr' level,
'all' level,
count(a.username) total,sum(a.bet) betTotal,sum(a.validbet) validbetTotal,sum(a.payout) payoutTotal FROM( -- 按会员group, 便于统计个数 SELECT a.childNodeId, rbrd.username,sum(rbrd.bet) bet,sum(rbrd.validbet) validbet,sum(rbrd.payout) payout FROM rpt_bet_rcd_day rbrd INNER JOIN mbr_account ma ON rbrd.username= ma.loginName INNER JOIN ( -- 获取 1该代理的所有下级代理id 2该代理id 3 该代理+所有下级代理id SELECT e.childNodeId FROM agy_tree e INNER JOIN agy_account t ON e.parentId = t.id WHERE t.agyAccount=#{agyAccount}
and depth>0
and depth=0
)a ON a.childNodeId = ma.cagencyId
GROUP BY rbrd.username ) a
